comments.author: Goddchen.4958
comments.body:
Hey Drama,

Check out my Android app ‘Guild Wars 2 API Explorer. I’d love to add a gw2stats.net Akitten ection. And I’d also be interested in helping out with the API :-)

Please contact me via PN or email: <my nickname>@googlemail.com

Goddchen

comments.author: Drakma.1549
comments.body: Quite simply there is a lot to do and I am but one person. Check out the post at http://gw2stats.net/blog/current if you are interested in helping out.
